body: WTF, what happened the Gamer's Lovers 2? Did it got deleted?

List of characters that appears in this doujin in order (part 3):
-Plum (Megaman Battle & Chase) |
-Prier (La Pucelle: Tactics) |
-Katt (Breath Of Fire 2) |
-Eiko (Final Fantasy IX) |
-Yashaki/夜叉姫 (Momotaro Dentetsu) |
-Nel Zelpher (Star Ocean: Till the End of Time) |
-Dizzy (Guilty Gear X) |
-Kumatora (Mother 3) |
-Yorda (ICO) |
-Shantae (Same name) |
-Femme (Skygunner) |
-Diane,Miriane and Loriane (Monster maker) |
-Peri (Fire Emblem If/Fates) |
-O ryu/お竜 (Furai Shiren GB 2) |
-Pear Fey (Ace Attoney 2) |
-Tabatha,Mist and Mei (Rune Factory) |
-Namco ten older sisters (Side Pocket) |
-Anna Holinski (Oshaberi! Horijo!) |
-Orifiela & Prima Donna (Dragon Quest IV)
